name: Weaponry Dealer VR
description: Welcome to the gunshop tycoon game in VR. During the day, you can sell guns legally to a buyer with a valid permit and reject those who don't have a valid permit. However, at night you can sell guns illegally to the very same buyers you rejected, as long as police don't notice you, of course.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: Intel Core i5-4590 (AMD FX 8350) or better. Graphics: GeForce GTX 970 (AMD Radeon R9 290) or better. Storage: 600 MB available space Sound Card: any Additional Notes: If you own a VR, info above is redundant
